textBeforeTable: The following tables are all the accessories, their level required to reach * or max level, any catalysts required to upgrate it, what synthesis group it is a part of and location it is found if it is a treasure. Accessories that are purchasable at a shop will be in the Shop section of the FF13 content. Any ability that starts with "Auto" does not mean it is constantly engaged. This simply means that at the start of every battle the attribute is added to the character until it wears off. All accessories in the same table transform into the accessory below it via the catalyst.
